alert.note: Alert for Inland Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A heavy shower with some lightning possible will impact portions of west central Kenedy County through 500 PM CDT... At 421 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy shower near Armstrong, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Armstrong, Norias, U S 77 Border Patrol Station and Armstrong Ranch Airport. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 724 and 742. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
